name: BON AIR CHANDELIER
description: Glowing with a rich finish and an abundance of light, our Bon Air Tiered Chandelier proclaims a powerhouse poise for your dining room or living room. This grand fixture fills your modern glam space with luxurious style.
status: In stock and ready to ship

name: CALYPSO SWIRL PENDANT
description: This beautiful swirling glass pendant with the added sculptural glass accentuating the swirl pattern on the outside is a unique, exciting take on a classic art glass pendant.

name: CLEAR GLASS SPHERE CHANDELIER
description: Clearly a winner in versatility and simplicity, this glass globe chandelier brings modern panache to your mid-century, contemporary, or minimalist space!

name: SOFT SEEDED VANITY LIGHT - 3 LIGHT
description: Bring antique-inspired charm to farmhouse and rustic bathrooms with this quietly refined bath sconce.

name: MODERN SHIELDED SCONCE
description: A clean, simple design takes the lead in this understated sconce in which a metal shield hides the LED lighting from direct view. LED GU10 base only.

name: YOUNG HOUSE LOVE DAPPER SCONCE
description: This Young House Love Dapper Wall Sconce is a super functional and attractive round wall light fixture for bathrooms or kitchens.

name: SCALLOPED SHADE SEMI-FLUSH CEILING LIGHT - 4 LIGHT
description: Add a little bit of elegance to your space with this sophisticated scallop shade fixture.

name: MOD BOWL SEMI-FLUSH CEILING LIGHT - LARGE
description: Simplistic and chic, the Mod Bowl Ceiling Light has modern hardware and a clear glass shade that exudes a sleek and minimal aesthetic.

name: COASTAL COTTAGE CEILING LIGHT
description: Combining clear water glass and rustic charm, this flush mount complements a myriad of styles from modern farmhouse and country lodge to classic colonial and coastal cottage.

name: 48' INDOOR/OUTDOOR METAL AND WOOD CEILING FAN
description: This quiet indoor/outdoor metal and wood ceiling fan with lights showcases a modern three blade design that embraces an artistic balance of cutting-edge technology, beauty, and modern design

name: 54' MODERN GLOBE LED CEILING FAN
description: Our Modern Globe Ceiling Fan has a transitional appeal with a modern twist.

name: 60' ANGLED SPOKE INDOOR/OUTDOOR CEILING FAN
description: Modern simplicity reigns with this indoor/outdoor patio ceiling fan, which showcases eight straight blades, crafted from ABS, curved at the ends and a powder-coated steel center

name: VINTAGE SUSPENDED PANE OUTDOOR SCONCE - SMALL
description: The square body and clear glass panes of this aged sconce have an open, breezy sensibility that's balanced by the sturdy metal frame, square backplate, and bold loop and hook suspension.

name: 9' LED SIMPLE ROUND LOW PROFILE CEILING LIGHT
description: This low profile ceiling light is the perfect solution when recessed lighting is not an option.

name: GEORGIAN SQUARED OUTDOOR POST LIGHT - LARGE
description: Handcrafted in Richmond, Virginia by our team of local artisans, this exclusive outdoor lamp post lantern light has design roots reminiscent of fixtures seen in sprawling English countryside estates.

name: CLASSIC PORCELAIN VASE TABLE LAMP
description: A classic vase shape for traditional decor, this table lamp is a beautiful shade of gray-blue for an updated take on traditional design. Off white modified bell polyester shade.

name: MODERN GLOBES VERTICAL FLOOR LAMP
description: Update your space with the unique style of our Modern Globes Vertical Floor Lamp.

name: YOUNG HOUSE LOVE HEXAGON GLASS TABLE LAMP
description: This colorful geometric table lamp from Young House Love has some serious glamour, and is perfect in any small space in need of some big style.

name: REFRESHINGLY RECTANGULAR MIRROR
description: Take a deep breath, this wall mirror is in a no stress zone.

name: PAESAGGIO WALL ART
description: Rich, moody tones and a serene subject unite in this bucolic giclee print.

name: CLEAR CONCEPT CLOCK
description: Modern, minimal, magnificent, our Clear Concept Clock does not steer you in the wrong direction with its function or its fashion.

name: LOTUS GLASS CEILING LIGHT - 3 LT
description: Give your space a whimsical yet elegant feel with the Lotus Glass Ceiling Light.

name: LUSTRE EN TRANSITION CONVERTIBLE LANTERN
description: Looking for a stately indoor lantern to take the place of an outdated chandelier or other hanging fixture?

name: SWIRLING GLASS GLOBE PENDANT LIGHT
description: This unique glass globe pendant is hand blown with an organic swirl pattern on a slightly iridescent clear glass globe with chrome hardware.

name: ED ELLEN DEGENERES DUNNE 4 LIGHT PENDANT
description: Dunne channels vintage lamps of yesteryear, with a rustic Aged Iron frame and a hand-sewn Natural Linen fabric shade that diffuses the light for a perfect glow.

name: BENT POCKET OUTDOOR SCONCE
description: A panel of aluminum is bent forward at the top and cradled by a bracket.

name: INDUSTRIAL BANDED GLOBE PENDANT - SMALL
description: The clear glass globe is encircled by a metal band and held aloft by arms that follow the shape and curvature of the globe.
